channel.title: todo on codethatapp
channel.description: Recent content in todo on codethatapp

item.title: Primer: When You Have Too Much to Do
item.description: You have a to-do list that scrolls on for days. You are managing multiple projects, getting lots of email and messages on different messaging systems, managing finances and personal health habits and so much more.
